caption:
Hot take from @skratchlabs @allenskratch Nutrition isn’t absolute.

What works for one athlete might not work for you—and that’s a good thing.⁠
⁠
In this episode of Your Diet Sucks, Dr. Allen Lim, founder of Skratch Labs breaks down one of the biggest myths in sports nutrition: that there’s one “right” amount of carbs per hour.⁠
⁠
Instead? Think of fueling as a chance to do some “me-search”—get curious, experiment, and find your own sweet spot.⁠
⁠
🎧 Full convo in the latest ep—link in bio!
